rooms.description: A spacious lobby that doubles as a living area with Vastu-compliant orientation. Natural lighting and ventilation are prioritized.
Private master suite featuring an en-suite bathroom, closet space, and a balcony for relaxation, designed with Vastu principles ensuring auspicious placement of windows.
Comfortable guest room oriented towards the east to harness positive energy.
A dedicated study area with ample natural light and minimal electronic interference as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen adjacent to a dining area. The layout considers energy flow and efficient movement for cooking and dining.
Fully-equipped gym with a dedicated space for cardio and strength training equipment, placed away from the main living areas as per local norms.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned to welcome positive energy. Designed with secure access, it includes a foyer area that separates the outside environment from indoor spaces.
Large windows allow for natural light and proper ventilation in living areas and bedrooms, following Vastu principles of directional placement.
Small balconies in the master bedroom and study provide outdoor spaces while preserving privacy.
